title: The Rainbow serpent
brief_description: Set in Dreamtime, this Aboriginal legend about a serpent named Goorialla whose journey across Australia resulted in the creation of the geographical features and the animal and plant life found there today. Based on Dick Roughsey’s award winning series. Narrated by David Gulpilil. No other credits available.
